item.title: What the Debates over American Heritage Are Really About
item.description: The wars that someone’s ancestors fought in are beside the point.

item.title: An Exorbitant Burden
item.description: Not today, but tomorrow, Uncle Sam is broke. Point the blame at fiat currency.

item.title: When New Art’s Really Old: From the Valley of the Kings to Pompeii to a Rubens in a Paris Closet
item.description: Some of 2025’s biggest art discoveries, plus the Swamp art scene spills into 2026.

item.title: A Syllabus of Conservative Thought
item.description: My crash course, in seven units.

item.title: The Trump Administration Should Articulate and Defend Its Tariff Game Plan
item.description: The team has approached its most distinctive economic policy in a way that maximizes its ability to negotiate, but not its ability to play defense.
